ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hunting grounds for 50+
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve heard the Hole recommended before. Anyone have tips or info about the layout of that place? luv, -Su I find the best places for xp as a dark, bearing in
ygData.messageBody:
I've heard the Hole recommended before. Anyone have tips or info about the
layout of that place?
luv,
-Su


I find the best places for xp as a dark, bearing in mind I have limited
choices on a pvp server so I probably miss out on some of the best haunts,
at 52 is Skyfire Mountains and Chardok both on Kunark. Also Sol B on the
mainland is still good there if you can get a beetle group or maybe even a
fire giant group there. The Hole on Odus and Cobalt Scar on Velious would
also be good exp at that level I think.
Jen

----- Original Message -----
From: Su
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, July 28, 2002 5:38 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Hunting grounds for 50+


Ok now that my cleric is lvl 52, I'm trying to find a good place to hunt
to
get xp. Also, are there any parts of my epic that I can do out of order.
Like can I kill some mob in nagafen's lair or such without doing the other
parts first? Or does the king something or other.. whatever it is there..
does it have to be triggered by the quest to spawn? I'm worried that I
will
hit one of those zones where if you are over 52 you will be banished to
zone
beginning so I want to do what I can while lower lvl and then do the
higher
lvl stuff once I've gone up more.
Any suggestions?
luv,
-Su
